title: "What is the connection between ancient Swedish magic, Odin, and the power of the gaze?"
first_phrase: In the preceding text, the author discusses the origins of the word "fascination" and its connection to the ancient Swedish people's practice of magic, which they learned from the Vani and Finni. In the last 200 tokens, the author introduces the idea that the gestures accompanying hypnotism are significant, akin to words. They cite various sources, including Franz Anton Mesmer and Luzy, and their own professor, Erminio di Pisa, who taught them about the practical application of hypnotism. The author also mentions Otello Ghigi, a stage hypnotist they knew in life.
